requests.name: Get Categories
requests.description: Retrieves all categories in Spreaker

requests.name: Change Episode Image
requests.description: Change Episode Image

queryParams.description: The id of the image to set to the episode. The image must be uploaded before using it (see Upload an image) and must belong to episode authors images storage.

requests.name: Delete Episode
requests.description: Deletes an episode. Theres no way to recover a deleted episode.

requests.name: Get Episode
requests.description: Retrieves an episode by unique identifier.

requests.name: Edit Episode
requests.description: Edit episode info (eg. title, description, category, tags, ...)

requests.name: Get Episode Media List
requests.description: Get Episode Media List

requests.name: Get Episode Streams
requests.description: The response contains a collection of ICY streams.

requests.name: Get Episode Streams
requests.description: The response contains a collection of RTMP / RTMPT streams.

requests.name: Get Live Episodes
requests.description: Retrieves all live episodes at the moment of the request

queryParams.description: An list of show_id applied as a filter

requests.name: Explore Category Items
requests.description: This API returns information and items of a specific category. The response contains two properties at root level:

queryParams.description: contains category information, the exact same information exported by /explore/categories API
contains a sorted list of shows or episodes, depending on the category type (type 1 and 3 contain episodes, type 2 contains shows)

requests.name: Create Media
requests.description: Upload a new Media in the specified user library

queryParams.description: The file to upload, encoded multipart/form-data
The media length in milliseconds. It will be autodetected is missing. The real length will be calculated while encoding either if this property is specified.
The music style associated to this media. Can be only a Style supported by Spreaker
The media type: can be one of SONG, JINGLE, LOOP, UNKNOWN, EFFECT, EPISODE

requests.name: Get Owned Media
requests.description: Get a paginated list of media owned by <user_id> filtered by type:.

queryParams.description: The column upon which the results are sorted. Accepted values: name, created_at
The direction of sorting. Accepted values: ASC, DESC

requests.name: Get Owned Media
requests.description: Get a paginated list of media owned by <user_id> filtered by type:.

queryParams.description: The column upon which the results are sorted. Accepted values: name, created_at
The direction of sorting. Accepted values: ASC, DESC

queryParams.description: The column upon which the results are sorted. Accepted values: name, created_at
The direction of sorting. Accepted values: ASC, DESC

The direction of sorting. Accepted values: ASC, DESC

requests.name: Get Top Live Episodes
requests.description: Retrieves live episodes sorted by rank

queryParams.description: The rank is language - based. This parameter specify which language you want to use to filter contents

requests.name: Get Media
requests.description: Retrieves a Media by unique identifier.

requests.name: Search users, shows and episodes
requests.description: Search users, shows and episodes

requests.name: Search Shows
requests.description: This API allows to find shows.

requests.name: Dele Show
requests.description: Deletes a show. Theres no way to recover a deleted show. Only show without episodes in it can be deleted.

queryParams.description: Shows sms number (eg. numer to text to)
Shows telephone number (eg. number to call for interviews)

requests.name: Get Show
requests.description: Retrieves show information.

requests.name: Edit Show
requests.description: Edit show info (name, description and contacts).

requests.name: Get Show Episodes
requests.description: Retrieves all listenable episodes by show (both live and podcast, ordered by published_at DESC).

requests.name: Create podcast
requests.description: Creates new podcast episode.

queryParams.description: True if the episode contains explicit content (defaults to false)
True if the episode should be private (defaults to false)
The single media_id or ordered list of media_id that compose the episode
The channels on which this episode has to be shared.

requests.name: Get All Show Episodes
requests.description: Retrieves all episodes by show (both live and podcast, ordered by published_at DESC).

requests.name: Create Show
requests.description: Create a new Show.

requests.name: Get User
requests.description: Retrieves an user by unique identifier.

requests.name: Edit User
requests.description: Edit user info (eg. fullname, description aka biography, gender, birthday, ...).

queryParams.description: User gender: can be MALE or FEMALE

requests.name: Get User Actions
requests.description: Retrieves the user actions settings

queryParams.description: The user has published a new episode ( either live or podcast )
The user wants to share on facebook the specified action
The user starts following a radio
The user has sent a message to a radio
The user starts following a show
The user has sent a message to a show
The user wants to share on twitter the specified action
The user starts following another user

requests.description: Edit facebook share settings.

queryParams.description: The user has published a new episode ( either live or podcast )
The user starts following a radio

The user starts following a show

The user starts following another user

requests.name: Twitter Settings
requests.description: Edit twitter share settings.

queryParams.description: The user has published a new episode ( either live or podcast )
The user starts following a radio
The user starts following a show
The user starts following another user

requests.name: Delete Device
requests.description: Delete the association from a mobile device and a registered user

requests.name: Create Device
requests.description: Creates a new device.

queryParams.description: The application related to the request

requests.name: Get User Episodes
requests.description: Retrieves all listenable episodes by user (both live and podcast, ordered by published_at DESC).

requests.name: Change User Profile Image
requests.description: Change User Profile Image

queryParams.description: The id of the image to set to the episode. The image must be uploaded before using it (see Upload an image) and must belong to episode authors images storage.

requests.name: Upload An Image
requests.description: Upload An Image

requests.name: Newsfeed
requests.description: This API returns a list of newsfeed items. The request MUST be authenticated (an user can only fetch its own newsfeed).

queryParams.description: The last newsfeed item received in the previous request, so that this request will contains immediately subsequent items
Max number of items in the response

requests.name: Get Favorite Shows
requests.description: Retrieves the list of shows whose authors are followed by <user_id>.

queryParams.description: True (1) to enable the export of the latest episode. The latest episode could be the current live (if any) or the latest podcast.

requests.name: Search Users
requests.description: This API allows to find users.

requests.name: Get Authenticated User
requests.description: Retrieves information about the authenticated user.

requests.name: Change Show Image
requests.description: Change Show Image

queryParams.description: The id of the image to set to the episode. The image must be uploaded before using it (see Upload an image) and must belong to episode authors images storage.
